email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CFR terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thanks for reaching out. We have the vessel SEA HORIZON available for your route. The freight quote is USD 45/MT. Laycan is 20-25 September. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 45/MT seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your response.
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Liam,

The SEA HORIZON has a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 230m. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 42/MT. Does this meet your requirements?

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

USD 42/MT is more reasonable. However, we are also considering a laycan extension to 27-30 September. If you can accommodate this, could you offer a rate of USD 40/MT?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Final Offer
email_chain.body:
Liam,

We can extend the laycan to 27-30 September and offer a final rate of USD 41/MT. This is our best and final offer. Please advise soonest as the vessel is in high demand.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Agreement
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

USD 41/MT it is! Consider it agreed. Please send over the recap.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
